In the evening, hungry stomachs come to the throne to prevent you from working, like craving something to fill the void before dinner time. The fastest & safest option to "relieve cravings" is: Fry fish skewers are being DISCOUNTED 2k at MINISTOP.

My family loves to drink tea for 3 generations. And I\'m addicted to MINISTOP Coffee SAME PRICE 12K from 06h00 - 11h00 EVERY DAY.
When the time comes, who can resist anymore, come to MINISTOP to close the order now!
MINISTOP Coffee – The “genuine” Coffee coordinates of the coffee connoisseurs.

For days when the mood is up and down, "precarious", snacking with some sweets is really "the happiness vitamin".
If you are still wondering where to find the "happy vitamin", then turn right into MINISTOP with a wide variety of sweet snacks of all kinds such as: Grapefruit Tea, Corn Tea, Fresh Cream Cake, Durian Crepe Cake, Tofu with black sugar pearls, ALL of them get 1K OFF.

A new "extreme" dish appeared at MINISTOP that made Team "sweet" undeniably: Strawberry CREAM.
Looking at a beautiful cake, tasting a little sweet taste of strawberry jam & honey, adding a little fat of whipping cream is enough "excess gas" for a high-mood day.
Come to MINISTOP to solve your sweet craving right away.
Do not forget to take measures to prevent and control the epidemic according to the "5K" recommendation of the Ministry of Health to ensure the health of the community & yourself when shopping at MINISTOP.
Sự hòa quyện tuyệt vời giữa phô mai kéo sợi beo béo dai dai và xúc xích giòn sần sật đã miệng. Ăn một lần là nghiền một đời nhé!.
Món ăn vặt thơm ngon, làm từ bột nếp với lớp vỏ vàng giòn, phần ruột mềm, dẻo, dai, thơm mùi mè, hấp dẫn..
CÁ VIÊN CHIÊN GIẢM 2K CHO DÂN GHIỀN ĂN VẶT
GIỜ VÀNG GIÁ SỐC – ĐỒNG GIÁ CÀ PHÊ 12k
ĐÃ “CƠN THÈM” ĂN VẶT VỚI ĐỦ MÓN NGON TẠI MINISTOP
BÁNH KEM DÂU – NGỌT NGÀO VỊ BÁNH, THỎA LÒNG BẤT KỲ AI
